commit.message:
Add examples to `bool::then` and `bool::then_some`

Added examples to `bool::then` and `bool::then_some` to show the distinction between the eager evaluation of `bool::then_some` and the lazy evaluation of `bool::then`.

Add examples to `bool::then` and `bool::then_some`

Added examples to `bool::then` and `bool::then_some` to show the distinction between the eager evaluation of `bool::then_some` and the lazy evaluation of `bool::then`.
